title: I wonder what Zed thinks about Syndra's new Star Guardian......job?

1 Upvote= 1 orbgasm

{{champion:98}} Zed's got an eye patch fetish.
{{champion:238}} What? No, I don't-
{{champion:98}} *Holds up booklet of Solid Snake lewd pictures*
{{champion:238}} What?!? How did you-
{{champion:98}} When you attacked the temple I took it with me as a memento.
{{champion:240}} Good thing I don't wear none of 'em eye thongs.
{{champion:107}} ...I'm going to leave before this gets weird.
{{champion:141}} So that's why Zed always tried to gouge out my eye when we sparred...

> [{quoted}](name=Melledoneus,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=7BjmHVka,comment-id=0006,timestamp=2017-09-09T17:08:58.681+0000)

https://new2.fjcdn.com/comments/Mods+tell+me+a+story+about+my+thong+eye+patchreadygo+_64a055ef5d7c9cd425fd14d9d368ecd0.jpg
In Zed's defense, Syndra does look quite fine in her SG outfit.
Syndra looks fine in anything.
i heard she looks fine in nothing
I'm so disappointed right now.
To be fair this is a rather clever comment.
I guess my version was just too subtle?  Maybe I should have put "nothing" in quotes...
Stop right there immature person who was going to change Raptor's "anything" to a different word!
Who? Me?  I'd say nothing... >_>
-_- I'm watching you Wazowski
rip, it was I main swain who did it
{{champion:141}} {{item:3070}} Z…Zed senpai?
Why did riven see leona in the shower... creepy...

Ever heard of them...

http://na.leagueoflegends.com/sites/default/files/styles/scale_xlarge/public/upload/header_6.png

Pool parties?
why is she crying in a public bath then XD everyone should know then

I know for a fact some(most?[all?]) pools have showers too.
Maybe they got out before or after everybody else left?
how's the storm fish?
It is coming right at me, the eye will likely go right over me. It will be reaching me tomorrow morning, and should be at it's worst tomorrow evening.
I wish you luck fish...Like I said from what I've heard...you're in for a rough ride. Then again you'll probably laughing and swimming am I rite?

We shall see. It is gonna be a close one. Got everything boarded up, and a good amount of food and water. But there is also a lot of trees around me that could fall. Thankfully I am far enough in-land that the storm surge couldn't reach me.

If you're worried about it you could do some damage to the tree in such a way it falls away from your house when the storm hits. also might want to see if there's some way to control which way it's gonna fall. I'd say rope but That might be a lot of effort and time you don't have.

Yeah it is too late to change anything. The storm starts in the morning (though it won't get bad until late afternoon, with the worst being expected very late sunday/early morning monday). 

Thankfully, the most dangerous tree already fell earlier this year (and since it wasn't that windy it didn't hit very hard). And I do have a concrete block house. My roof is wooden though, but still. Being in a hurricane this large is never going to be safe, but I am about as safe as someone can be here I think. 

At this point, I just have to stay in the house and hope for the best.
Wish you luck. Hope to see some sort of dank meme about this when it's said and done.

Am i the only one who downvotes every post from this guy no matter what he says ?
I think you're an asshole for picking this topic out of all of them to say that.

RIVEN CAN SING

...Am I the only one who got the reference?

It's a reference...?

Captain? Please explain? ;w;
Riven's Voice Actress is also a singer
I see. Thank you, kind sir! :D

> [{quoted}](name=DuskDaUmbreon,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=7BjmHVka,comment-id=000b0001,timestamp=2017-09-09T22:57:36.646+0000)
>
> It's a reference...?
> 
> Captain? Please explain? ;w;

As RaptorKarr said, Christina Vee is a singer, AND she also did the vocals for the most well known English version of the pretty damn well known Bad Apple!!

So she's not just a singer.

She's a fucking famous singer.

Which is why I was surprised no one else seemed to have gotten the reference. Touhou's western audience isn't nearly as big as it is in Japan.
So far yes.

Then {{champion:21}} brings {{champion:37}} along, both in Arcade outfits.

{{champion:21}} "Glad we were passing by. We heard someone needed music to sing to."
{{champion:37}} _Says nothing, but is still presenting Riven her Arcade outfit for the next part._
Yay Raptor back at it again with the fan fiction XD
idk if all the stories like this i see are you but if so keep it up these are pretty funny.
I dont see why shes embarrassed shes wearing more clothes than normal
